tweet_text: Hey guys! If you enjoy these comics, don't forget to support those that inspired them by following them and liking/retweeting their tweets!  Links are always included with each comic post. Thanks!
Also, special thanks to @existential_d for suggesting the tweet by @SimplySnaccbar.

This comic is based on a tweet by @SimplySnaccbar.

Please check out the original tweet and give it some love! https://twitter.com/simplysnaccbar/status/1136658928928940032?s=21 …
This comic is based on an awesome tweet by @tweetsaboutdog!
This comic is about coming out.
Hey, @LlamaInaTux! Peppa has a message for you.

This comic is based on a tweet by @glamoureptile!

Check out their original tweet here:
https://twitter.com/glamoureptile/status/1125450777860898818?s=21 …
We're looking to celebrate diversity and promote inclusivity. Tweets can be funny without being offensive, so please keep from posting anything negative or hateful. Thanks!

TWEET CALL! 

For Pride Month, we’re looking for funny queer-themed tweets to turn into comics.

Link a tweet by you or a friend and we’ll pick our favourites. Credits will always go to the original tweeter.

Please share!
Here's a 12-second clip of this comic's creation process. For those of you who like watching this stuff.
Woo! Thanks for all the likes and retweets, everyone! Don't forget to share that sweet tweet lovin' with @ShortSleeveSuit! This comic wouldn't be possible without them.
